title: DAO Manifest Schema
description: Defines an ethical micro-DAO within AIC-Governance. DAO authority is semantic, not financial or political.

domain.description: Ethical or functional domain this DAO is responsible for.

purpose.description: Human-readable explanation of why this DAO exists.

authority_level.description: Defines the DAO's scope of influence.

can_veto.description: Whether this DAO can emit an ethical veto signal.

depends_on.description: Other DAOs whose signals must be considered first.

sunset_allowed.description: Whether this DAO can be decommissioned if mission is complete or compromised.

ethical_commitments.description: Explicit ethical promises this DAO commits to uphold.
